title: --SKY RISE---FREE AMENITIES--FIDI CLASSIC--24 HOURS DOORMEN
posting_body: ['--SKY RISE---FREE AMENITIES--FIDI CLASSIC--24 HOURS DOORMEN', 'Listing ID #: 212925', 'Address: 20 EXCHANGE PLACE, #1232', 'Price: $3,145', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Lounge', 'Roof Deck', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', "Flex one bedrooms prime locations in downtown Manhattan's best luxury doorman buildings.", 'This residence boasts hardwood floors, marble bathrooms, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, and beautifully finished wood cabinetry.', 'Wrap around windows throughout providing ample light.', 'The Building presents showcases Sun Deck: soak up the sun or just sit and enjoy the views, Gym: State-of-the-art Techno Gym cardio and weight training equipment, and Lounge: Relax, Read, Play Billiards or entertain in the lounge.', 'FINANCIAL DISTRICT History meets modern-day allure in FiDi, the mecca of finance, commerce and technology located on the tip of Manhattan.', 'Among sweeping vistas of the Brooklyn Bridge and New York Harbor, architecturally distinct buildings from yesteryear have been beautifully refurbished and are complemented by luxury residential high rises.', 'One step away to Restaurants, Bar and South Sea Port Shopping center BUILDING AMENITIES Bike Room Concierge Gym Laundry in Building Live-in Super Community Recreation Facilities Storage Available Valet OUTDOOR SPACE Roof Deck', '"BETTER CALL MARCO" TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING MOBILE : 917-353-3448 EMAIL :', '<URL> TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
